org.jnativehook

Class NativeSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jnativehook.NativeSystem

  • public class NativeSystem
extends Object
    A small class to determine the native system's operating system family and architecture. The class is only used to determine which native library to unpack and load at runtime. This class is never used if the native library is loaded using the java.library.path property.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Alexander Barker (alex@1stleg.com)

      The system architecture enum.
      static class  NativeSystem.Family
      The operating system family enum.

      protected static Locale ROOT_LOCALE
      According to the docs, Locale.ROOT is the same as the locale whose language, country, and variant are empty ("") strings.

    • Field Detail

      • ROOT_LOCALE

        protected static final Locale ROOT_LOCALE
        According to the docs, Locale.ROOT is the same as the locale whose language, country, and variant are empty ("") strings. This is required to maintain Java 1.5 compatibility.
